pages.text: There are many different rituals that can be performed at the $(item)Altar$(), they do various things like creating items, creatures or effects! $(br2)The first important $(thing)Ritual$() required is that of creating the $(item)Magical Book$().
For this $(thing)Ritual$(), just click on the $(item)Altar$() with a $(item)Book$() during $(thing)Full Moon$() and enough $(thing)XP$() and a $(item)Magic Book$() will appear!
With the $(item)Magical Book$() you can craft $(item)Pages$() that are needed for most other $(thing)Rituals$().

There are other $(item)Pages$() too, but they are harder to get. $(br2)$(li)The $(item)Lost Page$() can be found in $(thing)Woodland Mansions$() $(br)$(li)The $(item)Banned Page$() can be found in $(thing)End Citys$()
